title: What happen about WaterPlace
author: 幻影随冥
txt_content:
What happen about WaterPlace ! I can't believe that !
The waterplace's water not 2000 !
Now , just 1466 Water ! What happen !
水管发生了什么！我都不能相信这些！
水管的水量连2000都没有！
现在只有1466水，发生了什么！

replies.txt_content:
